package.name: Conway3D
package.shortDescription: A Live Wallpaper by Ominousness Converted to XenHTML

descriptionlist.description: All I did was adapt the code for XenHTML and package it for easy download.
I am not responsible for the lag or battery drain that this may cause. Use at your own risk.
In order to use Conway3D, please install XenHTML from xenpublic.incendo.ws.
